title: Tornado.
description: Dustin, a young man on a journey, finds himself alone in a Midwestern town on the verge of one of the most catastrophic natural disasters to ever touch down. Tornado focuses on the encounters Dustin has as he makes his way into shelter and has to ride out the devastating storm. He meets an old trucker, a surly bartender, and a man referred to simply as, "The Drunk".
author: T.J. Childers
